name: Circle Mover
description:
A speed running game where you are a ball moving fast and you have a few mechanics to go fast and do cool stuff

my current records on the levels are:

Level 1: 3.32

Level 2: 4.40

Level 3: 6.28

Level 4: 8.32

Level 5: 7.28

Level 6: 9.50

Hope you have fun beating my times

The game controls are:

" A", "D" or "Left Arrow", "Right Arrow" for left and right movement.

"W" or "Space or Up Arrow" for Jumping.

"Left Click" to activate the spin bubble which allows for more flexible air movement.

"Right Click" to deactivate the spin bubble.

"Escape key" to go to the level selector and to quit the game.
